thread.title: Jurgen Klopp laid into his Liverpool flops at half-time during their 2-0 slump at Hull
thread.title_full: Jurgen Klopp laid into his Liverpool flops at half-time during their 2-0 slump at Hull

author: David Anderson
title: Jurgen Klopp laid into his Liverpool flops at half-time during their 2-0 slump at Hull
text:
Jurgen Klopp rages at poor Liverpool showing Share this video Watch Next 
“I saw in the Hull set piece that our formation was not right, after one second of the set piece,” said an unhappy Klopp. 
“It’s all about concentration, it’s all about being really in the game and finding the answer after a defeat that really hurts, not just myself, but the players too. The defeat was Liverpool's fourth in their last five games (Photo: Reuters) 
“Putting ourselves under pressure is a hobby of ours and now we have to show a reaction.” 
Klopp is demanding a response from his players against Tottenham on Saturday and he is deeply frustrated at seeing Liverpool’s promising season disintegrate. 
Liverpool have won just one of their 10 games in 2017 and have failed to win one of their first five league games at the start of a year for the first time since 1954, when they were last relegated. poll loading Will Liverpool finish in the Premier League's top four this season? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
